all_words.example: After the hike to the river the soldiers camped for the night. 士兵们步行到达那条河后露营过夜。
They went on a ten-mile hike through the forest. 他们做了一次穿越森林的十英里徒步旅行。
I love to ride horses on the beach. 我喜欢在海滩上骑马。
If you wish to avoid becoming shark bait yourself, take particular care if you surf. 如果你不想被鲨鱼攻击，那么你在冲浪时要特别小心。
We often fish at the lake on weekends. 我们经常周末在湖边钓鱼。
They go to the Alps to ski every winter. 他们每年冬天都去阿尔卑斯山滑雪。
This crop is widely grown on sandy land. 这种作物广泛种植在沙质土地上。
A large amount of waste is buried in the landfill each year. 每年有大量垃圾被埋在这个垃圾填埋场。
We should find ways to reduce pollution. 我们应设法减少污染。
Water is a precious natural resource. 水是宝贵的自然资源。
We encourage people to reuse shopping bags. 我们鼓励人们重复使用购物袋。
Long-term exposure to smoke can harm the respiratory tract. 长期暴露在烟雾环境中可能损害呼吸道。
Plants need sufficient sunlight to grow well. 植物需要充足的阳光才能生长良好。
Please remember to take out the trash. 请记得把垃圾拿出去。
This table is made of solid wood. 这张桌子是用实木制成的。
I use my computer for work and studying every day. 我每天用电脑工作和学习。
She bought a new laptop for university classes. 她为大学课程买了一台新笔记本电脑。
The camera on this smartphone takes excellent photos in low light. 这款智能手机的摄像头在弱光下能拍出很棒的照片。
He always wears headphones when listening to music on the bus. 他在公交车上听音乐时总是戴着耳机。
The children use a tablet for their online learning activities. 孩子们用平板电脑进行在线学习活动。
Please remember to charge your cellphone before going out. 出门前请记得给手机充电。
Please knock on the door before entering the room_进入房间前请先敲门
It was very thoughtful of you to bring me a cup of hot tea when I was working late_你在我加班时给我带了杯热茶，真是太体贴了
It is considered rude to talk with your mouth full of food_满嘴食物说话被认为是不礼貌的
I need to grab a quick lunch before the meeting starts_我需要在会议开始前赶紧吃个午饭
Could you please pass me the salt_你能把盐递给我吗
Children should learn to put away their toys after playing_孩子们应该学会玩完后把玩具收好
We would like to invite you to our anniversary celebration next Saturday_我们想邀请您参加下周六的周年庆典
Remember to wash your hands before having meals_记得饭前要洗手
Good friends are always willing to share their happiness and sorrow_好朋友总是愿意分享快乐和悲伤
This is my backpack. 这是我的背包。
Is this your pencil? 这是你的铅笔吗？
That is his new bicycle. 那是他的新自行车。
Her sister is a doctor. 她的姐姐是一名医生。
The cat is licking its paw. 猫咪正在舔它的爪子。
We love our school. 我们热爱我们的学校。
The children are playing with their toys. 孩子们正在玩他们的玩具。
This pen is mine. 这支笔是我的。
That seat over there is yours. 那边的那个座位是你的。
The red umbrella is hers. 那把红色的雨伞是她的。
This classroom is ours. 这间教室是我们的。
Our house is smaller than theirs. 我们的房子比他们的小。
She is cooking dinner in the kitchen. 她正在厨房做晚饭。
Our family often watches TV together in the living room. 我们一家人经常在客厅一起看电视。
The students are having lunch in the school cafeteria. 学生们正在学校食堂吃午餐。
The students are listening to the teacher in the classroom. 学生们正在教室里听老师讲课。
Children are not allowed to swim in the deep end of the pool without supervision. 儿童在没有监护的情况下不得在游泳池的深水区游泳。
Please remember to look both ways before walking on the crosswalk. 在过人行横道前请记住左右看看。
The early bird catches the worm_早起的鸟儿有虫吃
She picked some fresh berries from the bush_她从灌木丛中摘了一些新鲜浆果
Lions hunt together in groups to catch their prey_狮子成群结队地狩猎以捕捉猎物
The rabbit managed to escape from the fox_兔子成功从狐狸那里逃脱了
The cat began to creep slowly toward the mouse_猫开始慢慢地向老鼠爬去
The two boys were told not to fight on the playground_两个男孩被告知不要在操场上打架
The chicken pecks at the grains on the ground_鸡啄食地上的谷粒
Squirrels like to collect pinecones for the seeds inside_松鼠喜欢收集松果以获取里面的种子
The hen gave a loud squawk when it saw the cat_母鸡看到猫时发出了响亮的咯咯叫声
We must stop when the traffic light turns red_当交通信号灯变红时我们必须停车
The children learned to take turns on the slide_孩子们学会了在滑梯上轮流玩耍
It is polite to say 'please' and 'thank you'_说'请'和'谢谢'是有礼貌的
We need to clean up the classroom after the party_派对后我们需要打扫教室
Please don't drop litter on the ground_请不要在地上扔垃圾

all_words.chinese: 交通协管员/过路指挥员
all_words.example: The crossing guard helps children cross the street safely_交通协管员帮助孩子们安全过马路
Our school principal announced a holiday tomorrow_我们学校校长宣布明天放假
The lifeguard rescued the swimmer who was in trouble_救生员救了遇到麻烦的游泳者
The librarian helped me find the book I needed_图书管理员帮我找到了我需要的书
Someone stole my wallet on the train when I wasn't paying attention_当我不注意时，有人在火车上偷了我的钱包
She had a big smile on her face when she received the good news_当她收到好消息时，脸上露出了灿烂的笑容
The dog used its sensitive nose to find the hidden treats_狗用它敏感的鼻子找到了藏起来的零食
The archaeologists will dig carefully to uncover ancient artifacts_考古学家将仔细挖掘以 uncover 古代文物
She reached out her hand to help the elderly man cross the street_她伸出手帮助老人过马路
The children decided to hide behind the big tree during the game_孩子们决定在游戏过程中躲在大树后面
He fell down and scraped his knee while playing basketball_他在打篮球时摔倒擦伤了膝盖
She stored the homemade cookies in a large glass jar_她把自制饼干存放在一个大玻璃罐里
After walking all day, his feet were tired and sore_走了一整天后，他的脚又累又痛
The greedy child took all the candies without sharing with others_这个贪婪的孩子拿走了所有的糖果，没有与别人分享
She lifted the heavy box with both arms_她用双臂提起了沉重的箱子
The students looked bored during the long and difficult lecture_在漫长而困难的讲座中，学生们看起来很无聊
The baker wakes up early every morning to prepare fresh bread_面包师每天早起准备新鲜面包
My father likes to cook delicious meals for our family on weekends_我父亲喜欢在周末为家人烹饪美味佳肴

all_words.chinese: 显示器/监控器；监视/监控
all_words.example: The system administrator uses specialized software to monitor the server's performance in real-time_系统管理员使用专业软件实时监控服务器的性能
She has been learning English since she was ten years old_她从十岁起就开始学习英语了
Please mark the important points in the document with a highlighter_请用荧光笔标记出文档中的重要点
The delivery driver planned the most efficient route to save time and fuel_送货司机规划了最有效的路线以节省时间和燃料[1](@ref)
Could you please remind me to call my mother after the meeting_你能提醒我在会议结束后给我妈妈打电话吗
Their journey across the continent took them through many different landscapes and cultures_他们穿越大陆的旅程经历了许多不同的景观和文化[6](@ref)
He completed the entire project without any help from his colleagues_他在没有任何同事帮助的情况下完成了整个项目
The science museum offers interactive exhibits for children to learn about physics and biology_科学博物馆为儿童提供了互动展品来学习物理和生物学
Silicon Valley is known for its concentration of tech companies and startups_硅谷以其聚集的科技公司和初创企业而闻名
Please read the first section of the textbook before tomorrow's class_请在明天上课前阅读教科书的第一章
The chemistry students conducted an experiment to test the reaction between acids and bases_化学系的学生进行了一项实验来测试酸和碱之间的反应
Their catering business remained strong despite the recession_尽管出现经济衰退，他们的酒席承办业仍然景气
My kids spend hours chatting on the phone to their friends_我的几个孩子在电话上和朋友聊天一聊就是几个小时
He approached the door, maintaining a safe distance_他向门口走去，保持着安全的距离
I'm glad to hear that you passed the examination_我很高兴听到你通过了考试
She has years of experience in teaching children_她在儿童教育方面有多年的经验
She bought a book and a pen at the store_她在商店买了一本书和一支笔
The main topic of today's meeting is artificial intelligence technology_今天会议的主要主题是人工智能技术
Modern technology has greatly changed the way we communicate_现代科技极大地改变了我们的交流方式
Scientists continue to explore new possibilities in robot development_科学家们继续探索机器人发展的新可能性
You can connect your phone to the robot via Bluetooth_你可以通过蓝牙将手机连接到机器人
This washing machine can be controlled remotely through a smartphone_这台洗衣机可以通过智能手机远程控制
The household robot can be controlled by a mobile app_这个家用机器人可以通过手机应用控制
Smart phones have become essential tools for controlling modern devices_智能手机已成为控制现代设备的重要工具
We use the internet to search for information and communicate with people worldwide_我们使用互联网来搜索信息并与世界各地的人交流
The astronauts piloted the spaceship down to the lunar surface_宇航员驾驶宇宙飞船在月球表面降落[10](@ref)
The spacecraft's camera captured stunning images of Earth from a million miles away_航天器相机从一百万英里外拍摄了令人惊叹的地球图像[3](@ref)
Earth is the planet we live on, and scientists are studying other planets in distant star systems_地球是我们居住的行星，科学家正在研究遥远恒星系中的其他行星[6,7](@ref)
The king held a feast for all his loyal subjects_国王为他所有忠诚的臣民举行了一场盛宴
This music album contains all the artist's greatest hits_这张音乐专辑包含了这位艺术家的所有热门歌曲
The company has a long tradition of fine design_这家公司的优秀设计历史悠久
We visited an ancient temple full of treasures and saintly relics_我们参观了一座充满宝藏和神圣遗物的古老寺庙
She spent the morning wrapping up the birthday gifts_她花了一个早上的时间把生日礼物都包了起来
We chose to live out of town and commute to work every day_我们选择住在郊外，每天通勤上班
The children used a stick to draw pictures in the sand_孩子们用棍子在沙地上画画
I am extremely grateful to you for your selfless assistance_我非常感谢你无私的帮助
The sound of laughter echoed through the hall_笑声在整个大厅里回荡
Please fill the glass with water_请把杯子装满水
She received a packet of seeds from the garden center_她从园艺中心收到了一包种子

mastered_words.example: The bullet train reaches 300 km/h_高铁时速可达300公里
I can hear birds singing outside_我能听见外面的鸟鸣
The snake sheds its skin annually_蛇每年都会蜕皮
Cargo ships cross the ocean daily_货船每日横渡大洋
Pigs have excellent sense of smell_猪有灵敏的嗅觉
Diamonds are the hardest natural material_钻石是最坚硬的天然物质
Marble surfaces feel cool and smooth_大理石表面凉爽光滑
Athletes run laps around the track_运动员绕跑道跑步训练
Children sing nursery rhymes happily_孩子们欢快地唱儿歌
Greek salad contains feta cheese_希腊沙拉含有羊奶酪
Please don't touch the museum exhibits_请勿触摸博物馆展品
Carrot juice is rich in vitamin A_胡萝卜汁富含维生素A
Wood-fired pizza has unique flavor_窑烤披萨风味独特
Four seasons occur in temperate zones_温带地区有四季变化
Japanese rice has perfect stickiness_日本米具有完美粘性
Sunset painted the sky orange_夕阳将天空染成橙色
My sister studies architecture_我妹妹学习建筑学
Red roses symbolize true love_红玫瑰象征真挚爱情
Cherry blossoms turn pink in spring_樱花春季呈现粉色
Delivery vans load packages daily_快递货车每日装载包裹
Processed meat contains preservatives_加工肉制品含防腐剂
White snow covers the mountain peak_白雪覆盖着山峰
Black coffee contains no additives_黑咖啡不含添加剂
Vegetarian hamburgers use plant patties_素食汉堡使用植物肉饼
Giraffes have seven neck vertebrae_长颈鹿有七节颈椎
The antique shop sells vintage items_古董店出售复古商品
Cats groom themselves meticulously_猫会仔细打理毛发
She rides the subway to work daily_她每天乘地铁上班
Small details make big differences_细节决定成败
Elephants have excellent memories_大象记忆力极佳
Short hair is easier to maintain_短发更容易打理
The tree bark feels rough_树皮摸起来很粗糙
Children skate on frozen lakes_孩子们在结冰的湖面滑冰
Designer bags maintain value well_名牌包保值性能良好
Eagles fly at high altitudes_鹰在高空飞翔
Cashmere scarves feel incredibly soft_羊绒围巾触感极其柔软
Educational toys stimulate creativity_益智玩具激发创造力
Electric bicycles are gaining popularity_电动自行车越来越受欢迎
The violin case protects the instrument_小提琴盒保护乐器
The Yangtze River is Asia's longest_长江是亚洲最长的河流
Brown sugar adds depth to recipes_红糖为食谱增添层次感
Zebra stripes confuse predators_斑马条纹迷惑捕食者
Children skip rope during recess_孩子们课间休息时跳绳
The conference table seats twelve_会议桌可坐十二人
Lavender fields bloom purple flowers_薰衣草田绽放紫色花朵
Mechanical pencils need lead refills_自动铅笔需要补充笔芯
Service dogs assist disabled people_服务犬帮助残障人士
Chicken noodle soup comforts colds_鸡汤面缓解感冒症状
The lovely kitten purred softly_可爱的小猫发出轻柔呼噜声
Butterflies undergo metamorphosis_蝴蝶经历完全变态发育
Banana plants grow in tropical climates_香蕉树生长于热带气候
Autumn foliage displays vibrant colours_秋叶展现鲜艳色彩
It's important to eat balanced meals_均衡饮食非常重要
Traffic lights have three colors_交通信号灯有三种颜色
We worked together on the project_我们一起完成这个项目
Double-decker buses tour the city_双层巴士环城游览
Much effort goes into research_研究需要投入许多努力
The bedrooms are all upstairs_卧室都在楼上
Free-range chicken tastes better_散养鸡肉质更佳
The new software update fixes bugs_新软件版本修复漏洞
Hand-pulled noodles require skill_拉面制作需要技巧
Central Park is New York's landmark_中央公园是纽约地标
Two hours is sufficient for transfer_两小时足够转机
Electric cars reduce carbon emissions_电动汽车减少碳排放
Siberian tigers are endangered species_东北虎是濒危物种
Monkeys use tools to crack nuts_猴子使用工具砸开坚果
Tropical fish need warm water_热带鱼需要温水环境
The tall building dominates the skyline_高楼耸立在天际线上
Peacocks display magnificent tails_孔雀展示华丽的尾羽
This solution works very effectively_这个解决方案非常有效
Smartwatches track health metrics_智能手表监测健康数据
Tea pairs well with desserts_茶和甜点很相配
Children hop during playground games_孩子们在操场游戏中单脚跳
Can you guess the riddle's answer?_你能猜出谜底吗？
Cold fronts bring temperature drops_冷锋导致气温下降
Autumn harvest yields abundant crops_秋收带来丰硕成果
Cool breezes relieve summer heat_凉爽微风缓解夏日炎热
Winter sports thrive in snowy regions_冬季运动在雪域盛行
Science drives technological progress_科学推动技术进步
Tourists visit historical landmarks_旅游者参观历史地标
Employees attend mandatory training_雇员参加强制培训
Breakfast provides essential nutrients_早饭提供必要营养
Russian literature has global influence_俄罗斯文学具有全球影响力
Modern offices use ergonomic furniture_现代办公室使用人体工学家具
May I borrow your calculator?_能借你的计算器吗？
The charming cobblestone street was lined with cafes and boutiques_这条迷人的鹅卵石街道两旁遍布咖啡馆和精品店 | Children were playing safely on the quiet residential street_孩子们在安静的住宅区街道上安全地玩耍
We stayed in a charming little cottage with a beautiful garden_我们住在一座带有漂亮花园的迷人小屋里 | The guide's charming storytelling made the history come alive_导游迷人的讲述让历史变得生动起来
The view of the sunset over the mountains was truly unforgettable_山间日落的景色真是令人难忘 | It was an unforgettable experience volunteering at the animal shelter_在动物收容所做志愿者是一次难忘的经历
The children are playing happily in the garden behind the house_孩子们正在屋后的花园里开心地玩耍
I really admire the way she handles difficult situations with such calmness_我真的很欣赏她能以如此冷静的方式处理困境
Families often enjoy eating mooncakes while admiring the full moon during the Mid-Autumn Festival_在中秋节，家家户户常常边赏圆月边吃月饼
Could you tell me the story about how this tradition started_你能告诉我这个传统是怎么开始的吗
